game.name: Fidget Spinner X Racer
game.description:
Do you love playing with colorful fidget spinners? Are you a type of person for whom fidget is the best playing tool to kill time? If yes, trying out Fidget Spinner X Racer can prove to be a nice bet for you. Give this brand new arcade challenge a try to witness the amazing fidget spinner phenomenon! Put your fingers on your mouse or tap the screen to steer your flying fidget spinner while avoiding the obstacles! Try to keep it away from getting hit by walls or any other obstacles that you see on your way!

Make sure that your fidget spinner maintains a proper distance from the moving blocks. Try to grab rings to secure extra points and earn some power-ups on the way in this html5 spinner game! Dodge all the obstacles and try to make it run fast! Make sure that it does not hurt any part of the city. Work hard to control the spinner to reach the highest score in this big matrix! Complexities will keep increasing as you enter the advanced level.

Pass it inside the blue circles to increase your score while keep moving in the city! Put your sharp reflexes and hand-eye coordination skills to the test to guide your spinner to escape this city safely and reach to its destination! Be careful and react the actions around you time to create the maximum score possible! Make some maneuvers and move your spinner using the arrow keys! Move it by tilting your mobile phone to have fun without download it!
